html:
Valsoft Corp, a Canada-based acquirer and developer of vertical market software companies, has acquired Advanced Weighing Systems (AWS), a US-based provider of truck scale ticketing and data collection software.

The transaction will enable Valsoft to expand its industrial portfolio.

Deal In Brief

Deal TypeAcquisition
Sub-Category100% Acquisition
Deal StatusCompleted: 2022-01-17

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Advanced Weighing Systems d/b/a AWS
Acquirer (Company)Valsoft Corporation

Deal Rationale

% Acquisition100%
